Package com.bws.jdistil.core.security

Interface Summary
IDomain Interface defining domain specific information.
ISecurityManager Interface defining methods required by a Security Manager.
 

Class Summary
Cryptographer  
DefaultSecurityManager Default security manager.
SecurityManagerFactory Provides static access to an application defined security manager factory using a class specified in the framework properties file.
 

Exception Summary
SecurityException Package level exception defined as a base exception for the security package.
